long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ultimate knife challenge!

Throw the knives into the logs to break them. Slash the apples and unlock new knives.

Be careful to not hit the knives or the spikes. Time your actions, target carefully and become the knife master!

INTRODUCTION
Play Knife Hit on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No Internet required, no ADS, and 100% Free!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Knife Hit extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Knife Hit icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Knife Hit popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

HOW TO PLAY?
Throw the knives into the logs by clicking to break them. Slash the apples and unlock new knives.
